name: Which Properties can be Smart Animated?
description:
Which Properties Can Be Smart Animated?

This file is an animation created using Smart Animate. It's meant to be a fun demonstration showcasing what you can animate using the Smart Animate feature in an informative way.


You don't need to duplicate the file, you can watch the full animation right on this page. If you're interested in seeing how it works under the hood, duplicate it to learn more!


Which Properties can be Smart Animated?

The following properties can be smart animated:

  • Position
  • Scale
  • Opacity
  • Fill color
  • Rotation


Further learning

Want to learn more about Smart Animate? Read our Smart Animate article on the Figma help center, or watch the video tutorial on the Figma YouTube channel.


You can also learn how to create your own custom easing curves not shown here by reading this article or watching our custom easing curves video tutorial.
